text: I had a great experience with Golden bar and restaurant equipment . Great prices and I received the items I ordered promptly and with great customer service. Alejandro and Gaby helped me a lot to find what I was looking for and when they delivered the equipment they gave me great feedbacks on how to take care of it to avoid any issue.  THANKS A LOT Golden bar & restaurant equipment. Definitely I will do business again with you.
We appreciate the helpfulness of Marco and Gabby! They are the best in town for your bar and restaurant equipment needs! Five stars all around!  -Cebu Inasal staff (Fidel Cruz)
Always great customer service. Friendly and knowledgable staff. Great quality equipment, clean, reasonable prices.
